Texts.Chs: 也许你现在应该建造一所^orange;炼金台^reset;了，并着手学习化学的奥妙！
Texts.Eng: Now perhaps it's time you created a ^orange;Bio-Chem Lab^reset; and start learning about the wonders of chemistry!

Texts.Chs: “^orange;沙子^reset;可能无处不在，但^orange的价值来源;硅^重置;。^ ^橙色是最丰富;沙漠复位;生物群落。你需要^橙色;钙质层石头^橙色;也从沙漠，所以你应该很快去一个。
^orange;沙子^reset;可能无处不在，但它们的确是一种^orange;硅^reset;的有价值的来源。它们在^orange;沙漠^reset;生物群落中最为丰富，而你也将需要同样来自沙漠的^orange;硝石^reset;，所以现在赶快动身前往吧！
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Sand^reset; might get everywhere but it is a valuable source of ^orange;Silicon^reset;. It is most abundant on ^orange;Desert^reset; biomes. You'll need ^orange;Caliche Stone^orange; from a desert too, so you should head to one soon.
